data.title: Hug Tracker
data.solution:
n = gets.to_i
durations = gets.split.map(&:to_f)
hugs = durations.select{|i| i >= 5 }.size
puts hugs < 4 ? "Struggling!" : hugs < 8 ? "Surviving!" : 
  hugs < 12 ? "Stable." : "Thriving!"
puts 4 - hugs
data.stubGenerator:
read n:int
loopline n duration:float
write Struggling!/Surviving!/Stable./Thriving!
4 - hugs

STATEMENT
data.inputDescription:
<<Line 1 :>> an integer [[n]]
<<Line 2 :>> [[n]] space-separated floats each representing the [[duration]] of a hug you've had today in seconds
data.outputDescription:
<<Line 1 :>> either {{Struggling!}}, {{Surviving!}}, {{Stable.}} or {{Thriving!}} depending on the number of hugs you've received (that lasted ≥ 5 seconds).
<<Line 2 :>> the difference between 4 and your current hug count.

lastVersion.statementHTML:
Goal

A 1995 study into depression found that "4 hugs per day was an antidote for depression, 8 hugs per day would achieve mental stability and 12 hugs per day would achieve real psychological growth".

Given an integer n and then n space-separated hug durations in seconds (floats) representing all the hugs you've had today, determine which range you are in and how many hugs you are from reaching the 4 hug per day benchmark.

Only count hugs that last at least 5 seconds towards this goal.

If the total hug count is less than 4, print Struggling!
If the total hug count is greater than 3 but less than 8, print Surviving!
If the total hug count is greater than 7 but less than 12, print Stable.
If the total hug count is greater than or equal to 12, print Thriving!

Then print the difference between 4 hugs per day and your current hug count.
Input
Line 1 : an integer n
Line 2 : n space-separated floats each representing the duration of a hug you've had today in seconds
Output
Line 1 : either Struggling!, Surviving!, Stable. or Thriving! depending on the number of hugs you've received (that lasted ≥ 5 seconds).
Line 2 : the difference between 4 and your current hug count.
Constraints
1 ≤ n ≤ 100
0 < duration < 30
Example
Input
4
6.08 12.38 8.24 9.12
Output
Surviving!
0
